name: TubeWorld
description:
TubeWorld is a game created for the 8th Black and White Jam. One requirement for the jam is that the game must contain only two colors! I chose black and magenta. 

Note: The boss might be a little easy. This game is just a proof of concept right now. It will get more challenging and have more content in future updates!

Theme:

The theme given in the jam was Loop. To see how this game fits the theme, simply explore the map with your character! 

If you're still not convinced, this is the game map.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Shoot

C - Select/Use Item

Credits:

Programming/Design: Radar

Music: FidelDelgado

Art: Traced outlines from opengameart sprites
